content: quote: A former U.N. official who oversaw reconstruction funds in Afghanistan diverted half a million dollars from roads, schools and clinics to fund his luxury lifestyle, according to a confidential internal U.N. investigation. The U.N. Procurement Task Force has accused Gary K. Helseth, an American who headed the U.N. Office for Project Services in Afghanistan from 2002 to 2006, of using the funds for lavish purchases, including first-class flights to Las Vegas and meals in posh restaurants in Copenhagen, Dubai, Florence and New York. Helseth oversaw more than $1 billion in reconstruction funds contributed by the U.S. and other international donors after the fall of the Taliban. The probe is a cautionary tale about the risks of lax U.N. financial controls in Afghanistan as the Obama administration presses for a more central role for the United Nations in coordinating rebuilding efforts there. (Washington Post, March 27, 2009, Pg. 11)
quote: A former U.N. official who oversaw reconstruction funds in Afghanistan diverted half a million dollars from roads, schools and clinics to fund his luxury lifestyle, according to a confidential internal U.N. investigation. Helseth oversaw more than $1 billion in reconstruction funds contributed by the U.S. and other international donors after the fall of the Taliban. The probe is a cautionary tale about the risks of lax U.N. financial controls in Afghanistan as the Obama administration presses for a more central role for the United Nations in coordinating rebuilding efforts there. (Washington Post, March 27, 2009, Pg. 11)
title: Ex-U.N. Official Spent Development Funds on Luxury Items

content: The only organization more corrupt than the US Congress/Politician is the Useless Nation (AKA UN). "Some people spend an entire lifetime wondering if they made a difference. The Marines dont have that problem." Pres. Reagan, 1985.

content: Time to abolish the UN folks, It's the most corrupt mini-government on the face of the earth. Not only that it's a laughing stock, and I don't want to shock you but the only teeth the UN has ever had is US. (Notice the play on letters? ) Back to topic, fry the guy. Until we hold individuals ACCOUNTABLE for their actions will we all see the progress WE want to see.
